mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_cart ( uid, goods_id, num, goods_image, goods_title, goods_price, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{goodsId}, #{num}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsTitle}, #{goodsPrice}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, uid, goods_id goodsId, num, goods_image goodsImage, goods_title goodsTitle, goods_price goodsPrice FROM t_cart WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{countPerPage}
SELECT id, num FROM t_cart WHERE uid=#{uid} AND goods_id=#{goodsId}
SELECT id, uid, goods_id goodsId, num, goods_image goodsImage, goods_title goodsTitle, goods_price goodsPrice FROM t_cart WHERE id=#{cartId}
